March 31, 1961
Mr. Richard B. Hull
Executive Director
The Ohio State University
Telecommunications Center
2470 North Star Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
I>ear Dick:
The other day when gou were in the office I meant to mention
to you the letter regarding the International Conference on
Scientific Problems on Visual Information which you had for¬
warded to Bill on March 23rd. However, we had too many other
things to talk about at the time.
I have checked with what sources I could find fcs you know
Leonard is out of the country and I couldn't check with him),
and can seem to dig up very little Information. I am sure that
this is not the international conference for which we are seek¬
ing RCA financial support. Neither is it the conference in
Montreux which we hope that Bill will attend.
I will continue to try and find out more about it, and if I do,
you can be sure I will let you know all the details.
Cordially,
Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
